name: palestinian-domain-blocker
description: Community-driven domain blocking extension supporting Palestinian solidarity through ethical boycotts

scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.zip:chrome: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const archiver=require('archiver'); const output=fs.createWriteStream('palestinian-domain-blocker-chrome-v3.1.1.zip'); const archive=archiver('zip'); output.on('close',()=>console.log('Chrome extension packaged successfully!')); archive.on('error',err=>{throw err;}); archive.pipe(output); const folderName='Palestinian-Domain-Blocker-Chrome'; const files=['manifest.json','background.js','popup.html','popup.js','blocked.html','blocked.js','icons/','README.md','INSTALL.md','QUICK-INSTALL.md','install-extension.bat','install-extension.ps1','LICENSE']; files.forEach(file=>{if(fs.existsSync(file)){if(fs.statSync(file).isDirectory()){archive.directory(file,folderName+'/'+file);}else{archive.file(file,{name:folderName+'/'+file});}}else{console.warn('Missing file:',file);}}); archive.finalize();"
scripts.zip:firefox: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const archiver=require('archiver'); const output=fs.createWriteStream('palestinian-domain-blocker-firefox-v3.1.1.zip'); const archive=archiver('zip'); output.on('close',()=>console.log('Firefox extension packaged successfully!')); archive.on('error',err=>{throw err;}); archive.pipe(output); const folderName='Palestinian-Domain-Blocker-Firefox'; const files=['manifest-v2-firefox.json','background-firefox.js','popup.html','popup.js','blocked.html','blocked.js','icons/','README.md','INSTALL.md','QUICK-INSTALL.md','install-extension.bat','install-extension.ps1','LICENSE']; files.forEach(file=>{if(fs.existsSync(file)){const filename = file === 'manifest-v2-firefox.json' ? 'manifest.json' : (file === 'background-firefox.js' ? 'background.js' : file); if(fs.statSync(file).isDirectory()){archive.directory(file,folderName+'/'+file);}else{archive.file(file,{name:folderName+'/'+filename});}}else{console.warn('Missing file:',file);}}); archive.finalize();"
scripts.zip:all: npm run zip:chrome && npm run zip:firefox

author: Palestinian Solidarity Community
